text: maku ihalokanlo mariyu paralokanlo kuda manci sthitine vrayi. Niscayanga memu ni vaipunake maralamu." (Allah) samadhanam iccadu: "Nenu korina variki na siksanu vidhistanu. Na karunyam prati danini avarinci unnadi. Kanuka nenu danini daivabhiti galavariki, vidhidanam (jakat) icce variki mariyu na sucanalanu visvasince variki vrastanu
